Structs/HTTPClientError.html#/s:15AsyncH.name: missingSocketPath
Structs/HTTPClientError.html#/s:15AsyncH.abstract: URL does not contain a socketPath as a host for http(s)+unix shemes.

Structs/HTTPClientError.html#/s:15AsyncH.name: alreadyShutdown
Structs/HTTPClientError.html#/s:15AsyncH.abstract: Client is shutdown and cannot be used for new requests.

Structs/HTTPClientError.html#/s:15AsyncH.name: unsupportedScheme(_:)
Structs/HTTPClientError.html#/s:15AsyncH.abstract: Provided URL scheme is not supported, supported schemes are: http and https

Structs/HTTPClientError.html#/s:15AsyncH.name: traceRequestWithBody
Structs/HTTPClientError.html#/s:15AsyncH.abstract: A body was sent in a request with method TRACE.

Structs/HTTPClientError.html#/s:15AsyncH.name: writeAfterRequestSent
Structs/HTTPClientError.html#/s:15AsyncH.abstract: Body part was written after request was fully sent.

Structs/HTTPClientError.html#/s:15AsyncH.name: connectTimeout
Structs/HTTPClientError.html#/s:15AsyncH.abstract: Creating a new tcp connection timed out

Structs/HTTPClientError.html#/s:15AsyncH.name: httpProxyHandshakeTimeout
Structs/HTTPClientError.html#/s:15AsyncH.abstract: The http proxy connection creation timed out.

Structs/HTTPClientError.html#/s:15AsyncH.name: serverOfferedUnsupportedApplicationProtocol(_:)
Structs/HTTPClientError.html#/s:15AsyncH.abstract: The remote server only offered an unsupported application protocol

Structs/HTTPClientError.html#/s:15AsyncH.name: deadlineExceeded
Structs/HTTPClientError.html#/s:15AsyncH.abstract: The request deadline was exceeded. The request was cancelled because of this.

Structs/HTTPClientError.html#/s:15AsyncH.name: requestStreamCancelled
Structs/HTTPClientError.html#/s:15AsyncH.abstract: The remote server responded with a status code >= 300, before the full request was sent. The request stream

Structs/HTTPClientError.html#/s:15AsyncH.name: getConnectionFromPoolTimeout
Structs/HTTPClientError.html#/s:15AsyncH.abstract: Aquiring a HTTP connection from the connection pool timed out.

Protocols/HTTPClientResponseDelegate.htm.name: didSendRequestHead(task:_:)
Protocols/HTTPClientResponseDelegate.htm.abstract: Called when the request head is sent. Will be called once.

Protocols/HTTPClientResponseDelegate.htm.name: didSendRequestPart(task:_:)
Protocols/HTTPClientResponseDelegate.htm.abstract: Called when a part of the request body is sent. Could be called zero or more times.

Protocols/HTTPClientResponseDelegate.htm.name: didSendRequest(task:)
Protocols/HTTPClientResponseDelegate.htm.abstract: Called when the request is fully sent. Will be called once.

Protocols/HTTPClientResponseDelegate.htm.name: didReceiveHead(task:_:)
Protocols/HTTPClientResponseDelegate.htm.abstract: Called when response head is received. Will be called once.

Protocols/HTTPClientResponseDelegate.htm.name: didReceiveBodyPart(task:_:)
Protocols/HTTPClientResponseDelegate.htm.abstract: Called when part of a response body is received. Could be called zero or more times.

Protocols/HTTPClientResponseDelegate.htm.name: didReceiveError(task:_:)
Protocols/HTTPClientResponseDelegate.htm.abstract: Called when error was thrown during request execution. Will be called zero or one time only. Request processing will be stopped after that.

Protocols/HTTPClientResponseDelegate.htm.name: didFinishRequest(task:)
Protocols/HTTPClientResponseDelegate.htm.abstract: Called when the complete HTTP request is finished. You must return an instance of your Response associated type. Will be called once, except if an error occurred.

Protocols/HTTPClientResponseDelegate.htm.name: HTTPClientResponseDelegate
Protocols/HTTPClientResponseDelegate.htm.abstract: HTTPClientResponseDelegate allows an implementation to receive notifications about request processing and to control how response parts are processed.

Extensions/URL.html#/s:10Foundation3URLV.name: init(httpURLWithSocketPath:uri:)
Extensions/URL.html#/s:10Foundation3URLV.abstract: Initializes a newly created HTTP URL connecting to a unix domain socket path. The socket path is encoded as the URL’s host, replacing percent encoding invalid path characters, and will use the “http+unix” scheme.

Extensions/URL.html#/s:10Foundation3URLV.name: init(httpsURLWithSocketPath:uri:)
Extensions/URL.html#/s:10Foundation3URLV.abstract: Initializes a newly created HTTPS URL connecting to a unix domain socket path over TLS. The socket path is encoded as the URL’s host, replacing percent encoding invalid path characters, and will use the “https+unix” scheme.

Classes/HTTPClient/NWTLSError.html#/stat.name: status
Classes/HTTPClient/NWTLSError.html#/stat.abstract: TLS error status. List of TLS errors can be found in

Classes/HTTPClient/Task.html#/s:15AsyncH.name: eventLoop
Classes/HTTPClient/Task.html#/s:15AsyncH.abstract: The EventLoop the delegate will be executed on.

Classes/HTTPClient/Task.html#/s:15AsyncH.name: futureResult
Classes/HTTPClient/Task.html#/s:15AsyncH.abstract: EventLoopFuture for the response returned by this request.

Classes/HTTPClient/Task.html#/s:15AsyncH.name: wait()
Classes/HTTPClient/Task.html#/s:15AsyncH.abstract: Waits for execution of this request to complete.

Classes/HTTPClient/Request.html#/s:15Asy.name: headers
Classes/HTTPClient/Request.html#/s:15Asy.abstract: Request custom HTTP Headers, defaults to no headers.

Classes/HTTPClient/Request.html#/s:15Asy.name: tlsConfiguration
Classes/HTTPClient/Request.html#/s:15Asy.abstract: Request-specific TLS configuration, defaults to no request-specific TLS configuration.

Classes/HTTPClient/Request.html#/s:15Asy.name: useTLS
Classes/HTTPClient/Request.html#/s:15Asy.abstract: Whether request will be executed using secure socket.

Classes/HTTPClient/Response.html#/s:15As.name: cookies
Classes/HTTPClient/Response.html#/s:15As.abstract: List of HTTP cookies returned by the server.

Classes/HTTPClient/Body.html#/s:15AsyncH.name: length
Classes/HTTPClient/Body.html#/s:15AsyncH.abstract: Body size. if nil,Transfer-Encoding will automatically be set to chunked. Otherwise a Content-Length

Classes/HTTPClient/Body.html#/s:15AsyncH.name: bytes(_:)
Classes/HTTPClient/Body.html#/s:15AsyncH.abstract: Create and stream body using a collection of bytes.

Classes/HTTPClient/Cookie.html#/s:15Asyn.name: httpOnly
Classes/HTTPClient/Cookie.html#/s:15Asyn.abstract: Whether the cookie should only be sent to HTTP servers.

Classes/HTTPClient/Cookie.html#/s:15Asyn.name: secure
Classes/HTTPClient/Cookie.html#/s:15Asyn.abstract: Whether the cookie should only be sent over secure channels.

Classes/HTTPClient/Cookie.html#/s:15Asyn.name: init(header:defaultDomain:)
Classes/HTTPClient/Cookie.html#/s:15Asyn.abstract: Create a Cookie by parsing a Set-Cookie header.

Classes/HTTPClient/EventLoopPreference.h.name: indifferent
Classes/HTTPClient/EventLoopPreference.h.abstract: Event Loop will be selected by the library.

Classes/HTTPClient/EventLoopPreference.h.name: delegate(on:)
Classes/HTTPClient/EventLoopPreference.h.abstract: The delegate will be run on the specified EventLoop (and the Channel if possible).

Classes/HTTPClient/EventLoopPreference.h.name: delegateAndChannel(on:)
Classes/HTTPClient/EventLoopPreference.h.abstract: The delegate and the Channel will be run on the specified EventLoop.

Classes/HTTPClient/EventLoopGroupProvide.name: shared(_:)
Classes/HTTPClient/EventLoopGroupProvide.abstract: EventLoopGroup will be provided by the user. Owner of this group is responsible for its lifecycle.

Classes/HTTPClient/EventLoopGroupProvide.name: createNew
Classes/HTTPClient/EventLoopGroupProvide.abstract: EventLoopGroup will be created by the client. When syncShutdown is called, created EventLoopGroup will be shut down as well.

Classes/HTTPClient/Configuration/HTTPVer.name: http1Only
Classes/HTTPClient/Configuration/HTTPVer.abstract: we only use HTTP/1, even if the server would supports HTTP/2

Classes/HTTPClient/Configuration/HTTPVer.name: automatic
Classes/HTTPClient/Configuration/HTTPVer.abstract: HTTP/2 is used if we connect to a server with HTTPS and the server supports HTTP/2, otherwise we use HTTP/1

Classes/HTTPClient/Configuration/Connect.name: idleTimeout
Classes/HTTPClient/Configuration/Connect.abstract: Specifies amount of time connections are kept idle in the pool. After this time has passed without a new

Classes/HTTPClient/Configuration/Connect.name: concurrentHTTP1ConnectionsPerHostSoftLimit
Classes/HTTPClient/Configuration/Connect.abstract: The maximum number of connections that are kept alive in the connection pool per host. If requests with

Classes/HTTPClient/Configuration/Redirec.name: follow(max:allowCycles:)
Classes/HTTPClient/Configuration/Redirec.abstract: Redirects are followed with a specified limit.

Classes/HTTPClient/Configuration/Timeout.name: connect
Classes/HTTPClient/Configuration/Timeout.abstract: Specifies connect timeout. If no connect timeout is given, a default 30 seconds timeout will applied.

Classes/HTTPClient/Configuration.html#/s.name: timeout
Classes/HTTPClient/Configuration.html#/s.abstract: Default client timeout, defaults to no read timeout and 10 seconds connect timeout.

Classes/HTTPClient/Configuration.html#/s.name: decompression
Classes/HTTPClient/Configuration.html#/s.abstract: Enables automatic body decompression. Supported algorithms are gzip and deflate.

Classes/HTTPClient/Configuration.html#/s.name: ignoreUncleanSSLShutdown
Classes/HTTPClient/Configuration.html#/s.abstract: Ignore TLS unclean shutdown error, defaults to false.

Classes/HTTPClient/Configuration.html#/s.name: httpVersion
Classes/HTTPClient/Configuration.html#/s.abstract: is set to .automatic by default which will use HTTP/2 if run over https and the server supports it, otherwise HTTP/1

Classes/HTTPClient.html#/s:15AsyncHTTPCl.name: eventLoopGroup
Classes/HTTPClient.html#/s:15AsyncHTTPCl.abstract: Undocumented

Classes/HTTPClient.html#/s:15AsyncHTTPCl.name: init(eventLoopGroupProvider:configuration:)
Classes/HTTPClient.html#/s:15AsyncHTTPCl.abstract: Create an HTTPClient with specified EventLoopGroup provider and configuration.

Classes/HTTPClient.html#/s:15AsyncHTTPCl.name: init(eventLoopGroupProvider:configuration:backgroundActivityLogger:)
Classes/HTTPClient.html#/s:15AsyncHTTPCl.abstract: Create an HTTPClient with specified EventLoopGroup provider and configuration.

Classes/HTTPClient.html#/s:15AsyncHTTPCl.name: syncShutdown()
Classes/HTTPClient.html#/s:15AsyncHTTPCl.abstract: Shuts down the client and EventLoopGroup if it was created by the client.

Classes/HTTPClient.html#/s:15AsyncHTTPCl.name: shutdown(queue:_:)
Classes/HTTPClient.html#/s:15AsyncHTTPCl.abstract: Shuts down the client and event loop gracefully. This function is clearly an outlier in that it uses a completion

Classes/HTTPClient.html#/s:15AsyncHTTPCl.name: get(url:deadline:)
Classes/HTTPClient.html#/s:15AsyncHTTPCl.abstract: Execute GET request using specified URL.

Classes/HTTPClient.html#/s:15AsyncHTTPCl.name: get(url:deadline:logger:)
Classes/HTTPClient.html#/s:15AsyncHTTPCl.abstract: Execute GET request using specified URL.

Classes/HTTPClient.html#/s:15AsyncHTTPCl.name: post(url:body:deadline:)
Classes/HTTPClient.html#/s:15AsyncHTTPCl.abstract: Execute POST request using specified URL.

Classes/HTTPClient.html#/s:15AsyncHTTPCl.name: post(url:body:deadline:logger:)
Classes/HTTPClient.html#/s:15AsyncHTTPCl.abstract: Execute POST request using specified URL.

Classes/HTTPClient.html#/s:15AsyncHTTPCl.name: patch(url:body:deadline:)
Classes/HTTPClient.html#/s:15AsyncHTTPCl.abstract: Execute PATCH request using specified URL.

Classes/HTTPClient.html#/s:15AsyncHTTPCl.name: patch(url:body:deadline:logger:)
Classes/HTTPClient.html#/s:15AsyncHTTPCl.abstract: Execute PATCH request using specified URL.

Classes/HTTPClient.html#/s:15AsyncHTTPCl.name: put(url:body:deadline:)
Classes/HTTPClient.html#/s:15AsyncHTTPCl.abstract: Execute PUT request using specified URL.

Classes/HTTPClient.html#/s:15AsyncHTTPCl.name: put(url:body:deadline:logger:)
Classes/HTTPClient.html#/s:15AsyncHTTPCl.abstract: Execute PUT request using specified URL.

Classes/HTTPClient.html#/s:15AsyncHTTPCl.name: delete(url:deadline:)
Classes/HTTPClient.html#/s:15AsyncHTTPCl.abstract: Execute DELETE request using specified URL.

Classes/HTTPClient.html#/s:15AsyncHTTPCl.name: delete(url:deadline:logger:)
Classes/HTTPClient.html#/s:15AsyncHTTPCl.abstract: Execute DELETE request using specified URL.

Classes/HTTPClient.html#/s:15AsyncHTTPCl.name: execute(_:url:body:deadline:logger:)
Classes/HTTPClient.html#/s:15AsyncHTTPCl.abstract: Execute arbitrary HTTP request using specified URL.

Classes/HTTPClient.html#/s:15AsyncHTTPCl.name: execute(_:socketPath:urlPath:body:deadline:logger:)
Classes/HTTPClient.html#/s:15AsyncHTTPCl.abstract: Execute arbitrary HTTP+UNIX request to a unix domain socket path, using the specified URL as the request to send to the server.

Classes/HTTPClient.html#/s:15AsyncHTTPCl.name: execute(_:secureSocketPath:urlPath:body:deadline:logger:)
Classes/HTTPClient.html#/s:15AsyncHTTPCl.abstract: Execute arbitrary HTTPS+UNIX request to a unix domain socket path over TLS, using the specified URL as the request to send to the server.

Classes/HTTPClient.html#/s:15AsyncHTTPCl.name: execute(request:deadline:)
Classes/HTTPClient.html#/s:15AsyncHTTPCl.abstract: Execute arbitrary HTTP request using specified URL.

Classes/HTTPClient.html#/s:15AsyncHTTPCl.name: execute(request:deadline:logger:)
Classes/HTTPClient.html#/s:15AsyncHTTPCl.abstract: Execute arbitrary HTTP request using specified URL.

Classes/HTTPClient.html#/s:15AsyncHTTPCl.name: execute(request:eventLoop:deadline:)
Classes/HTTPClient.html#/s:15AsyncHTTPCl.abstract: Execute arbitrary HTTP request using specified URL.

Classes/HTTPClient.html#/s:15AsyncHTTPCl.name: execute(request:eventLoop:deadline:logger:)
Classes/HTTPClient.html#/s:15AsyncHTTPCl.abstract: Execute arbitrary HTTP request and handle response processing using provided delegate.

Classes/HTTPClient.html#/s:15AsyncHTTPCl.name: execute(request:delegate:deadline:)
Classes/HTTPClient.html#/s:15AsyncHTTPCl.abstract: Execute arbitrary HTTP request and handle response processing using provided delegate.

Classes/HTTPClient.html#/s:15AsyncHTTPCl.name: execute(request:delegate:eventLoop:deadline:logger:)
Classes/HTTPClient.html#/s:15AsyncHTTPCl.abstract: Execute arbitrary HTTP request and handle response processing using provided delegate.

Classes/HTTPClient/EventLoopGroupProvide.name: EventLoopGroupProvider
Classes/HTTPClient/EventLoopGroupProvide.abstract: Specifies how EventLoopGroup will be created and establishes lifecycle ownership.

Classes/HTTPClient/EventLoopPreference.h.name: EventLoopPreference
Classes/HTTPClient/EventLoopPreference.h.abstract: Specifies how the library will treat event loop passed by the user.

Classes/HTTPClient/Task.html.name: Task
Classes/HTTPClient/Task.html.abstract: Response execution context. Will be created by the library and could be used for obtaining

Classes/FileDownloadDelegate/Progress.ht.name: Progress
Classes/FileDownloadDelegate/Progress.ht.abstract: The response type for this delegate: the total count of bytes as reported by the response

Classes/FileDownloadDelegate.html.name: FileDownloadDelegate
Classes/FileDownloadDelegate.html.abstract: Handles a streaming download to a given file path, allowing headers and progress to be reported.

Classes/HTTPClient.html.name: HTTPClient
Classes/HTTPClient.html.abstract: HTTPClient class provides API for request execution.
